name: Monsieur Fourier est furieux
description:
Highly interactive self-generative art piece which produces shapes of any complexity. The user can (but does not have to) take control of the drawing by modifying the algorithm through its graphical representation ("the machine") and by setting pen color and size.

Based on the mathematical principle of the Fourier series.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fourier_series


Notes:

- Sound on! Click once into the canvas to start sound.

- The work reacts to keyboard input only after the user has clicked into the canvas or hit return key at least once.

- When the movement stops, Monsieur Fourier wants to remind the user that they can interact with the machine.


+----------------------------------------------------------+
| Take control                                             |
+----------------------------------------------------------+

  Toggle between DRAW and EDIT mode             [return key]

  Toggle PAUSE                                   [space bar]

  Toggle RAINBOWS                                        [c]

  Change PEN COLOR                             [mouse wheel]

  Change PEN SIZE                                    [+] [-]

  DELETE drawing                               [right-click]


------------------------------------------------------------
The following things are possible in EDIT mode only:
------------------------------------------------------------

Place mouse cursor somewhere on the canvas, but not on a segment. Then:

  ADD or REMOVE segments                       [mouse wheel]


Place mouse cursor over the center point of a segment, then:

  Change segment RADIUS                        [mouse wheel] 
                                 or [hold left mouse button]

  Change segment SPEED                               [+] [-]


Place mouse cursor over the pen, then:

  Change COLOR                                 [mouse wheel]

  MOVE somewhere else (constrained)         [click and drag]

  MOVE somewhere else (free)  [shift key] + [click and drag]
